name: Cali
text: I support this local business however they hire ANYBODY and that by itself is an issue

name: Valerie Maly
text: No need to go anywhere else for a pizza. Simple Simon's has always been my favorite and always will be. So glad to have one right here in our town.

name: Heidi Seymour
text: Best pizza, prices are a bit high but worth it

name: Trish Long
text: Love fay she is the best

name: Snow's Organic Grows
text: This place has been through the years an don't ask much for a small town
